name: Imi's Dungeon
description:
One day, two adventurers went into a dungeon seeking for a treasure.

Help those two adventurers solve the dungeon floor and go to the next floor together. Both adventurers also move to the same direction and if even one adventure is down, the level restarts so move carefully.

Game also unlocks gallery whenever player finishes certain levels. Level progress is saved.

Feedbacks are welcome and appreciated.

How to play
  • Arrow keys: Move cursor/players
  • Z: Confirm
  • X: Cancel/Restart
  • Enter - Pause menu
Notes

The web version is free. The content of the web version and the desktop version are the same. However, I am planning to add next installment exclusively for the desktop version in the future. Stay tuned and thank you!

Last Changelog
  • v1.0 (May 5th, 2020 UTC)
    • First public release.
